english.segment1: Listen I'll tell you a story. Of lines you never get back. This is a reason to worry. The trials that make you a man
english.segment2: It's when I have my first heart attack. And I can't even breathe. You tell the truth, I know you wouldn't lie. That I'm on my last beat
english.segment3: So listen I'll tell you a story. Of trials that made me a man. This is a long destination. So try as long as you can
english.segment4: It's when I have my first heart attack. And I can't even breathe. You tell the truth, I know you wouldn't lie. That I'm on my last beat.
